tag_professor: Respected (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Great teacher! He is the right one if you are required to take Art History I. No doubt.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Mr. House is very approachable and always willing to help his students succeed. He can be funny at times and will put you at ease. I loved his class as well as his other classes for art majors.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
stu_tags: GET READY TO READ  LECTURE HEAVY
comments: Big lecture class, but the assignments are straightforward and he will explain questions as best he can. Little socially awkward but very friendly and I honestly think the cheesy puns make class better. All assignments are openbook and online which is awesome.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: The one good thing I can say about his teacher is that he\'s very good at staying in contact with you. I took him online and he emailed me back speedily if I needed anything. Other than that he\'s a very hard teacher that seriously requires critical thinking.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Get ready to read (2)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: I have taken Mr. House 4 Art History 1&2 Design 1&2. He is a nice man, funny sometimes. Not extremely hard but not easy either. In AH take notes & study, you should do good. In Design(only for majors) he is easier than the other Dteacher, if you get a bad grade on a piece you hav the option 2 redo it by the end of the semester 4 a better grade.
